sentences.sContent: There is a severe thunderstorm warning for some parts of the Southeast.
sentences.sContent_eng: There is a severe thunderstorm warning for some parts of the Southeast.
sentences.sCn: 东南部的地区会有严重的雷暴雨警告。

remMethod.val: thunder(雷)+storm(暴风雨)→雷电交加的暴风雨→雷暴

trans.tranOther: a storm with thunder and lightning
